cards.title: Start your business
cards.description: Essential tools, legal guidance and staff support to launch successfully.

cards.title: Improve your business
cards.description: Deliver quality experiences with customer insights, accessibility and service excellence.

cards.title: Promote your business
cards.description: Boost visibility through engaging content, social media and marketing partnerships.

cards.title: Grow your business
cards.description: Develop new products, secure funding and expand with expert advice.

cards.title: Create an inclusive business
cards.description: Create an inclusive business that all customers can enjoy without any barriers or restrictions.

cards.title: Scotland's Tourism Funding Opportunities
cards.description: Find out about Scotland's tourism funding opportunities available for your business. Including sources of funding, event funding and more.

cards.title: How to create business listings
cards.description: Find out how to create business listings online. Including where to list your business, details to include, how to track your performance and more.

cards.title: Customer service
cards.description: Find useful information on how to deliver great customer service. Including tips for responding to customer enquiries, bookings, staff training and more.
